attributes.action: Get rid of the TV license
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As most of us in the UK now have to pay for SKY TV as the programs on normal channels are pretty poor why should we still have to pay for a TV license?  Get rid of it once and for all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
